title: bAlanAi irundapOdu
sahitya:
bAlanAi irundapOdu paNDArak-kOlam pUNDu vElanE nI ninradun lIlai tAn anrO


anupallavi

  bAlanAgum undan lIlaiyaik-kaNDu magizha parama shivanAr koNDa priyam niraivEra


caraNam    parisAga mAmpazhattai pera ibbhAratanai duritamAga valam vanda shramamellAm vINAga
kari mukhat-tamayan anda parisaip-perak-kaNDu prakAshap-priyan nI pAshAnku sinam koNDu
